data.title: Practical Information â€“ QoMEX 2024
data.text:
The nearest airport is in Kallinge in Ronneby Municipality, about 35 kilometers east of Karlshamn. Estimated flight time between Ronneby Airport and Stockholm Arlanda or Stockholm Bromma is approximately one hour.

Ronneby Airport / Svedavia

Phone: +46 (0)10-109 54 00

Email: info@ronnebyairport.se

Ronneby airport website

Karlshamn is just 2.5h from Copenhagen by train. The trains arrive to, depart from, and connect to various bus lines at Karlshamn Resecentum, which is located north-east of the city center. In the same area you will also find Karlshamns Taxi and long-term parking.
